```{r setup, include=FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
#install and attach necessary packages

library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
library(plotly)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

Plots
- Scatterplot of penguin flipper length (x) vs body mass (y), with points having different colors based on species
- Make it interactive with plotly

```{r plotly}

penguins_graph <- ggplot(data = penguins,
       aes(x = flipper_length_mm, y = body_mass_g)) +
  geom_jitter(aes(color = species))

ggplotly(penguins_graph)
```
